content: I hustle upstream. I grasp. I grind. I control and panic. Poke balloons in my chest, always popping there, always my thoughts thump, thump. I snooze - wake and go boom. All day, like this I short my breath. I scroll and scroll. I see what you wrote - I like. I heart. My thumb, so...
source: My Therapist Wants to Know about My Relationship to Work
author: Tiana Clark
